title: Summoners' Society December Community Events!
body:
Summoners we are back after taking a break for November. Come celebrate the month of December with a range of events!

All sign up information is available on our website:  https://summonerssociety.com/news/celebrate-the-festive-season-with-summoners-society-mogul/

Please note during this month, we have a lot of new volunteers learning! This may cause some events to run a little slower than normal. This process will allow us to run more events in the future!

Don't forget that we have switched from Battlefy to a new platform called Mogul! 

If you need any assistance signing up please let us know below! A friendly admin will help you straight away.
